original_text: When the money of the people of Egypt and Canaan was gone, all Egypt came to Joseph and said, “Give us food. Why should we die before your eyes? Our money is all gone.”
korean_text: 애굽 땅과 가나안 땅에 돈이 떨어진지라 애굽 백성이 다 요셉에게 와서 이르되 돈이 떨어졌사오니 우리에게 먹을 거리를 주소서 어찌 주 앞에서 죽으리이까

sentences.original_text: When the money of the people of Egypt and Canaan was gone
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 사람과 가나안 사람들의 돈이 다 떨어졌을 때

sentences.original_text: all Egypt came to Joseph and said
Why should we die before your eyes?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 우리가 당신의 눈앞에서 죽어야 합니까?
